title: DJANAS
author: DJANAS
created_time: February 15, 2023, 11:22:22 PMLast edit: February 16, 2023, 12:43:50 AM by DJANAS
content: I was recently searching about a new token on the PancakeSwap platform, I found this sitehttps://tokensniffer.com/Where you can put the address of the Token, and site gives you information about this currency and its credibility from 0 to 100%.it shows you some of the most important information about the currency, from the purchase and sale fees to how honest the creators and owners of the currency, and if their accounts verified.Liquidity, number of tokens burned, developer wallet, etc.Finally, the site helps in quick research about new Token, but you must do your other research before investing in new Tokens.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I'm not sure if I'm he only person experiencing this but the link you provided in Op refuse to open for me in my device.This is what it's showing in my phone. I know pancake swap already have a feature that shows the credibility of exchanges but I don't know now if it has that of tokens as this site you provided. It sound kind of cool though. P.s. I think this thread fits well in the altcoin discussion board.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: DJANAS on February 15, 2023, 11:22:22 PMI was recently searching about a new token on the PancakeSwap platform, I found this site.Stop searching if you don't want to waste and lose your fund with new tokens which usually are scam or failed projects.I knew about the site you shared but just knew about it and never mind to use it. My impression about that site is it's like an advertisement site for newborn projects but most of altcoin projects are scam.If you spend your funds in those projects, firstly you would think you are genius by finding hidden gems but later you will learn hard lessons. Losing your funds easily with them.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: DJANAS on February 15, 2023, 11:22:22 PMhttps://tokensniffer.com/The site returns 403.Quote from: DJANAS on February 15, 2023, 11:22:22 PMWhere you can put the address of the Token, and site gives you information about this currency and its credibility from 0 to 100%.it shows you some of the most important information about the currency, from the purchase and sale fees to how honest the creators and owners of the currency, and if their accounts verified.Liquidity, number of tokens burned, developer wallet, etc.Finally, the site helps in quick research about new Token, but you must do your other research before investing in new Tokens.Pretty much any sites that dare to give credibility ratings are a fraud. The rating itself is likely based on a vague metricts or else, a manual biased rating. Also, the important information doesn't merely come from those things you mentioned, it is way more complex than that. Lastly, one can know for sure without deeply researching with or without this kind of site that most of a new tokens are highly likely worthless.

comments.author: DJANAS
comments.body: i don't know why it's not working by your browser guys, it's working normally. i checked it now

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: DJANAS on February 17, 2023, 11:21:42 PMi don't know why it's not working by your browser guys, it's working normally. i checked it nowI am using Opera browser. Is there a chance that certain jurisdiction are blocked from accessing your platform?I also tried using VPN and I keep getting the same error.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: I can confirm that the website is accessible. They use Cloudflare as bot protection so I won't be surprised if some IP addresses/VPNs are blocked. There might be some server issues but I can't verify it. If anyone needs to use a similar service there is also Unicrypt, Fluidefi, Poocoin, etc. Make sure to do your own research before you use them.The scoring system is quite arbitrary but at least they explain some key points in their analysis. Things as if a contract is verified or not, whether the contract ownership is renounced or not, etc. If anyone decides to use this tool, ignoring the scoring would be a better idea until they explain how the scoring works. You also need to be aware that the company behind this tool is famous for AML solutions so check their terms to see if they collect any personal data or not. Even if they said they don't collect personal info when somebody uses this, looking for open-source alternatives is a good idea.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Yeah I also using VPN Singapore server and get 403 Error meaning Im not allowed to access the site. Using Cloudflare was good but I do bet there is dozen of crypto people that using tor or VPN to access everything    Oh and I also is there any honeypot check in their website?

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: I suggest not using this site. Start looking for basic information yourself first like in whitepapers, support team, CMC, or sites that are already popular like cointelegraph or something like that.It is true that many new token projects can turn out to be scams or fail projects. I think, it is very important to do your own thorough research before investing in any new token.Also make sure the site you are visiting does have good trust, or is popular. Not relying on obscure metrics or even biased ratings.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: merekamo on March 13, 2023, 08:50:16 AMI suggest not using this site. Start looking for basic information yourself first like in whitepapers, support team, CMC, or sites that are already popular like cointelegraph or something like that.It is true that many new token projects can turn out to be scams or fail projects. I think, it is very important to do your own thorough research before investing in any new token.Also make sure the site you are visiting does have good trust, or is popular. Not relying on obscure metrics or even biased ratings.Why not? I tried with one token that I invested in and gives me a good analysis of the status of the token yes its a must to check the whitepaper and features of the token you're investing or will be investing but it will take you time and miss some point, you can use this tool and at the same time do a comparison with your own research and analysis, the tool has this disclaimer whenever they show the result on the token they analyzedQuoteThe audit score is a measure of how well the token meets the criteria for safety.  Automated scanners like this one are not always completely accurate.  A token with a high score may still have hidden malicious code. The score is not advice and should be considered along with other factors. Always do your own research and consult multiple sources of information.  Results are regenerated every 10 minutes.
